mapper.select: SELECT /* MLDChngRqstOutDAO.selectJoinPrdct */ A.MEM_NM , A.BRTH_MON_DAY , A.CELL , A.EMAIL , B.ACCNT_NO , C.PROD_CD , NVL(C.PROD_PRT_NM , C.PROD_NM) AS PROD_NM , C.PROD_AMT , C.EXPR_NO , (SELECT COUNT(SEQ) FROM PAY_MNG WHERE DEL_FG = 'N' AND ACCNT_NO = B.ACCNT_NO) AS TRUE_CNT , (SELECT NVL(SUM(PAY_AMT), 0) FROM PAY_MNG WHERE DEL_FG = 'N' AND ACCNT_NO = B.ACCNT_NO) AS TRUE_AMT , (SELECT NVL(SUM(PAY_AMT), 0) FROM PAY_MNG_DTL WHERE DEL_FG = 'N' AND ACCNT_NO = B.ACCNT_NO) AS RELAT_AMT , (SELECT NVL(SUM(PAY_AMT), 0) FROM PAY_MNG_DTL1 WHERE DEL_FG = 'N' AND ACCNT_NO = B.ACCNT_NO) AS ADD_AMT , B.JOIN_DT FROM MEMBER A, MEM_PROD_ACCNT B, PRODUCT C WHERE A.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO AND B.PROD_CD = C.PROD_CD AND A.DEL_FG = 'N' AND B.DEL_FG = 'N' AND A.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND B.ACCNT_NO = #{accntNo} AND EXISTS(SELECT 'X' FROM PAY_MNG WHERE DEL_FG = 'N' AND ACCNT_NO = B.ACCNT_NO) AND FN_ACCNT_STAT(B.ACCNT_NO) IN('Y', 'E')
